title: Gatekeeper Of The Boundless World
summary:
When the planet perishes and the gods fall, the collapse of the magical realm leaves humanity without any protectors. Now, "Anomalies" and "Catastrophes" begin to invade the human realm . As the Dark Age descends, a soul from Blue Star (Earth) is unexpectedly transported into this dying realm.

---

**Original Manhua**:
- [Acqq](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/656128)

**Official Translations:**     
- [English](https://www.webnovel.com/comic/myriad-realms-gatekeeper_31705778300125301)
- [Japanese](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/182941)

title: Seoul Exorcism Department
summary: No summary available.

title: Alien Abyss: Restart Era
summary: Yongsheng is an orphan who grew up in the Dream City, relying on the kindness of others. After his home was destroyed and those closest to him were devastated, he discovered the truth of the world. Guided by Mu Qing, he awakens a hidden power. To prevent further harm and protect those he cherishes, he joins the "Exterminators" and embarks on a path of resistance. Gradually, he begins to recover his lost memories, breaking through the darkness' rule time and again, ultimately leading humanity to freedom.

title: I’m Ready for Divorce!
summary:
Medi is a runaway former saint who can turn into a wolf and she now lives inside a forest. One day, she took care of a cute young boy who got lost in the woods and helped return him home once the boy started feeling better.

Ten years later, a beautiful young man visited her home saying, "I'm looking for the wolf that had helped me here in the past."

His name is Claude and it seems that he's the boy she had helped before! She can't admit to him that she is the wolf and in her attempt to cover it up, she somehow ended up volunteering to help him look for the wolf instead?!

---
**Original Web Publication:** [Palcy](https://palcy.jp/comics/1306), [Pixiv Comic](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/7895)
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/s0651f/)

title: The Caring Young Lady Wants to Be a Wall
summary:
Irina de Claudel was reincarnated as a background character in her favorite BL game. While she’s busy playing matchmaker to get her favorite pairing, Henri and Noel, together… She somehow ends up being loved by both of them!?
“All I ever wanted… was to be a wall between them…!”
Will Irina succeed in getting the two together in the end!? A chaotic love comedy where the heroine is adored by the very romanceable characters of a BL game!

title: The Duke’s Villainous Daughter Is Depressed
summary:
After passing out drunk on a cold night, I awake as a nameless young orphan girl. But she's not just any girl, she's a character from a novel I wrote in high school! Abused and sold at auction as a slave, I'm suddenly rescued by my father, Duke Henry Wensgrey, the story's original villain. Far from the wicked character I created, he's now a total fool for his daughter. But our relationship isn't the only thing that's changed, and I soon discover that this world isn't anything like what I wrote!

---
I possessed a character in a novel I had never finished writing when I was in high school. And then now I have the body of a supporting character instead of the main character. It was a seven-year-old orphan girl with no name… Having to suffer the abuse of others, until I got really tired and ran away from that place. But I was captured and sold as a slave. I thought my life was over… But the person who saved me was the novel's most prominent villain, Henriette.

He treats the emperor like a puppet. A person who has a reputation for being extremely cruel in the original and has a hobby of cutting the throat of aristocrats. …Is he my biological father? But other than that terrible reputation, living with him wasn’t bad either.

"Okay, my daughter. You can do whatever you want. If you want something, everyone in the family will do what you want."

Wait… I didn't write a novel like that in the first place?

title: I Regressed, but the World didn’t End
summary:
Humanity’s last hope just got a second chance… and a mountain of debt. 

Dohyeok, the champion of humankind, is sent back in time to stop the apocalypse. He then pours his time, money, and soul into preparing for an alien invasion that never comes. 

Now chased by creditors instead of aliens, Dohyeok turns to game streaming to repay his debt. 

Follow the ex-hero-turned-streamer as he hacks his way through popular game titles one epic stream at a time!

title: Light of Arad: Forerunner
summary:
Summoned to purify the corruption spreading across Arad...?

Jinseong, a player who dedicated his life to "Dungeon & Fighter," is summoned to Arad by the transcendent Nemer and given the mission of becoming the Claw Master.

“You shall become the Claw Master and guide the blade through rightful trials.”

"I'll become the Claw Master or whatever it takes. I will survive in this Arad!"

Will DFO veteran Jinseong successfully complete his mission and return to the real world? The story of the Dark Knight Jinseong's quest to prevent the destruction of Arad begins!

title: Peerless
summary:
Noh Gajang is a strong, dedicated, and humble man, with much respect for the martial arts. But after the death of his lovely wife, this muscle-for-hire just wants an easy job that allows him to be a good father to his three little babies. He’s even happy to pull guard duty and fend off amateur fighters if it means he can return home safely each night. 

But when a creepy cult starts stealing children from the city, Gajang must step up to the challenge and discover his true warrior potential.

---
- [Original Webtoon <kakao> Season 1](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=52226628)
- [Original Webtoon <kakao> Season 2](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59925132)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/47154)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%97%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%9E%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%89%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%99/132)

title: Legend of Star General
summary: A spinoff centering on Lu Bu Fengxian.

title: Disastrous Necromancer
summary:
In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer! Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges. What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?

---

**Original Webtoon:**  
- [KuaiKan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/18819/)

**Official Translations:**

- [Russian](https://recomics.org/manga/necromancer-i-am-the-disaster)

title: Return of the Frozen Player
summary:
When Seo Junho and his companions sacrificed themselves to defeat the Frost Queen, they thought they were restoring peace to Earth. But after 25 years of being frozen solid, Junho thaws out only to find that nine more floors appeared in his absence, only one of which has been cleared!

As the only one who holds the key to clearing the next floor and defrosting his friends, Junho must step up once again. But has this hero been in hibernation too long to take on the world’s fearsome new foes?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%96%BC%EC%96%B4%EB%B6%99%EC%9D%80-%ED%94%8C%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4%EC%9D%98-%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98/2463)
---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.podoteng.com/)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/79447)

title: Magic Emperor
summary:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)

title: Growth-Type Superhero
summary: In a world where humanity battles monsters with powerful weapons called Relics, Hinata Asahi is the ultimate underdog at Valkyria Academy, a school for training warriors. Mocked for his relic, a gimmicky suit that looks like a comic book costume, and bullied by classmates, no one knows it holds a secret. The more he is pushed down, the stronger it becomes. Driven by his father’s legacy, Hinata forges new friendships and pushes past every obstacle. With unwavering determination, can he rise to become one of the academy’s strongest?

title: How to Live as a Villain
summary:
Rishe, the daughter of a duke, is stuck in a time loop that begins at the moment her engagement is annulled and ends with her early demise at the age of 20. She has now begun her seventh loop.  
  
In her past do-overs, Rishe experienced various occupations, including being a merchant, a pharmacist, and a knight. But this time around, she simply wishes to live a long and leisurely life!  
  
That *was* the plan, only for it to be derailed by an unprecedented marriage proposal from her killer in the previous loop, the neighbouring country's Crown Prince—?!  


---

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1784ga/)

title: THE HEAVENLY DEMON LORD WHO DOESN’T WANT TO LEVEL UP
summary:
"Jin Yuseong, the absolute master of the Middle Kingdom, found life too boring. 'I must be crazy. Just unifying the martial world…'"
"'I should have just been a farmer.'"
"'No, I wish I wasn't born at all.'"
"In 'The Heavenly Demon Lord Who Doesn't Want to Level Up,' one day, he encounters a gate… And upon passing through it, a new world unfolds."
"Jin Yuseong, the top martial deity and leader of the Celestial Demon Cult, arrives in Korea.

title: How a Villainess Survives as a Saint
summary:
Grimoire Alchemist is a dating sim popular among both boys and girls in Japan. The player’s rival in love, Claudia Ellington, is jokingly called the “Villainess of a Thousand Deaths.” But this alias of hers is actually no joke; she really does die a thousand times in the game!

Alas, our poor little protagonist ends up filling Claudia’s shoes when she gets reincarnated in the world of Grimoire Alchemist. Determined to escape the dire fate she has in store for her, Diehard Grimoire Alchemist Fan #1 (now the reincarnated Claudia) does everything she can to avoid entering the love interests’ romance routes in an attempt to separate herself from the game’s storyline and save her own skin. Despite her best efforts, she fails spectacularly as her love for the characters and game compendium of a brain lead to her pulling off impressive feats one after another.

Join her as she (much to her dismay) magnificently steals the hearts of the game's charming love interests!

title: The Lone Necromancer
summary:
Seongwu is a former special forces soldier who has returned to college after completing his national service. His ordinary life as a student is shattered during class one day when he and his fellow students are faced with a mysterious prompt asking them to “select a role.”

Seongwu chooses the necromancer, a rare ability that grants him the power to control the undead.

With the campus and outside world seemingly on the brink of collapse, Seongwu must use his newfound powers to battle fearsome monsters and help save his fellow students. But will they make it out alive?

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)

title: A Stepmother’s Märchen
summary:
They called her the Iron Widow. 

When her husband died, he left her to manage not only his vast holdings but also his four children. Young and inexperienced, Shuri nonetheless tried her best to raise them, despite their bitter attitude towards her. She is finally free to live her own life as her eldest son marries… only to find herself mysteriously reset to seven years ago — the night of her husband's funeral. 

Can Shuri find happiness with this second chance at a new destiny?

title: I Got A Job At A Haunted Mansion
Conquering the Academy with Just a Sashimi Knife
summary:
Chef Kim, Korea's legendary sashimi master, is transported into the world of Bles sing M, a mobile game he once played. But instead of being a hero, he finds himself as Geomma Kang, a mere background extra. 

Forced into a new life, Geomma discovers a new power: the Blessing of the Blade God. Now, to survive in this game-like world, he must slice through challenges and enemies alike. 

Will his unmatched skills in the kitchen be enough to carve out a new destiny?

title: The doomsday ruthless man: hoarding trillions of supplies at the beginning
summary: The earth is affected by unknown energy, the core expands, and natural disasters and doomsday come. Extreme heat, earthquakes, volcanic eruptions, floods, severe cold... natural and man-made disasters come one after another! Su Chen struggled through the apocalypse and finally entered the safe zone, but was betrayed by his girlfriend in the end! Reborn and returned to one month before the end. This time, I only live for myself!

title: I Can’t Wait To Eat You
summary: Outstanding talent. A look that won't be overlooked no matter where you are. A prosperous family. I lived by walking only on well-paved paths. Everything was so perfect to the point that it was boring. Then one day when I turned 30... Taejun Kim impulsively deviates from the path. To meet ‘Han So-eun’, the daughter of the driver who took his parents’ lives. 'With what kind of face did you come to this company?' The shameless face was disgusting. So he decided to stick around and torment her. Like a person who is impatient because he can't eat... “I think the director likes..."

title: Relationship Principle
summary: While helping a friend confess, Na-yoon unexpectedly receives a confession from the popular Do Seol-woo! Though momentarily shaken by Seol-woo’s unexpected confession, Na-yoon believes that love is still a luxury she can't afford and rejects him. However, Seol-woo isn't ready to give up so easily and asks, "Can't we at least be friends?"

title: Elegant Desire
summary: What’s the chance of running into your first love again after twelve years? This is exactly what happens to Solhui after attending her frenemy’s bridal shower. What’s more? Her first love is having an affair with a married woman. But that’s not all. She meets him and the woman again when she starts a viola lesson with a new student.

title: Youth Lovesome
summary:
"It may be hazy blue, but that's alright"

Taking place a year after the epilogue of Seasons of Blossom, this story focuses on the new opening of “Cafe Blossom and NEMONE Atelier” as well as Bomi’s new classmate “Pureum” as they explore a new found youth. 

Campus romance, after school romance, office romance, it has it all.  

The heartwarming series is back with another youthful story!

title: In This Life, I’m Resigning From Being a Villain Queen
summary: "Congratulations, host, for completing the ultimate mission to kill the Bloody Queen, Reina. Guard leader Max's favorability has reached maximum, and your charm index has reached maximum..." Hearing this sudden electronic chime, I should be happy too. That is, if I'm not Reina. After death, Reina returns to five years ago, knowing that her loyal guard, gentle fiancé, and tsundere brother will all soon backstab her and fall under the host's spell. This time, Reina decides to just run away.

title: Sam Plays the Game
summary:
Kosuke found himself in a whole different world. Standing there with the wilderness to the east and a forest to his left, he decided to make good use of the occurrence, and tests his knowledge, to where he finds this amazing crafting ability, just like the games from his original world! ――This is a light for life in a different world. When I thought, I was suddenly attacked by a beautiful dark elf...?!
___
- [Official LN (Eng)](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/survival-in-another-world-with-my-mistress-light-novel/)

title: I’m The Tyrant Family’s Beloved Baby
Food Chain
summary:
I, Go Eun-woo, have lived while hiding my status among humans. I used my abilities to reduce the pain of scarlet fever, the fate of the Tiger tribe, which I have suffered from since I was 18, but was discovered by the Tiger's natural enemy, Imae.
“Don’t be so foolish. If you run away, you’ll die by my hands in a month or so.”
Moreover, this cold and frighteningly handsome Lee Mae,
I can’t believe I have the same seal as Lee Do-hoon. I bought time by lying, but it's only a matter of time before I get caught. I have to escape from his grasp somehow... !
“Please stay in my room with me for the time being.”
Can I go back to my normal daily life?!

title: My Little Brother Is The Academy’s Hotshot
Helmut: The Forsaken Child
summary:
Helmut was a child who had been abandoned in the Demonic Beast Forest at birth.
Raised by Demonic Beasts, the first human that he met was the Sword Saint Darien.
Little did Helmut know that the chance encounter would soon shake the foundation of his fate…

“Grow stronger If you want to get out of here.”

The boy who’d lived like a beast was thrown into the human world!
He possessed overwhelming swordsmanship, outstanding looks and sharp intelligence, but there was one thing he lacked: humanity.

I am no longer a prey. I am now a predator!

title: Didn’t We Agree To Have Pure Love?
summary:
When the sadistic heroine travels through time and space to the body of the puppet princess of a fallen nation in a 18+ novel... Can she keep herself unscathed in a den teeming with hungry wolves?

"Wait... Didn't they say this is a pure love story? Why are there so many perverted male protagonists?!"

title: Tears on a Withered Flower
summary: Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.

title: Being a Maid is Better than Being a Princess
summary:
Siana was a princess of a small kingdom. Until the imperial army attacked…

Just before her neck was about to be cut by the cruel prince, Siana screamed, “Please spare me!”

Towards the prince with blood staining his beautiful face, Siana pleaded with a desperate voice.

“I have many skills learned in the palace. Wouldn’t I be useful as a maid?”

And so, Siana became a probationary maid of the palace. But surprisingly, the job suited her temperament?! When she swept the floors, the corridors became clean, when she kneaded dough, sweet cookies were baked, when she did laundry, the bedding became white and fragrant! She only did her best as a maid, but gradually, the royal family began to warm up to Siana.

“The tea you brewed is always the best.”

“The dress you made? Truly beautiful.”

“I want you to educate the prince.”

But she never thought of capturing this man’s heart…

“I feel the same.”

“…”

“I can’t live without you, Siana,” hearing the tender voice of the prince, Siana tightly closed her eyes.

Look, Your Highness. I just want to live as an ordinary maid!

title: Loved by The Dead
summary:
Collection of oneshots from author Tatsuki Fujimoto.

Volume 1: 17-21

- Chapter 1. **There were Two Chickens in the Garden (Niwa ni wa Niwa Niwatori ga Ita, 庭には二羽ニワトリがいた。)**
A strange world where aliens have taken over the human world, and only two humans are left which are apparently disguising themselves as mere chickens.

- Chapter 2. **Sasaki-kun Has Stopped the Bullet (Sasaki-kun ga Judan Tometa, 佐々木くんが銃弾止めた)**
To Sasaki, his teacher Kawaguchi is God. She taught him not to be ashamed of his own dreams and made him feel fully capable to forge forward and make them come true, no matter how low the odds. Yet one day, trouble from Kawaguchi's past follows her into the classroom. With his god in danger of total humiliation, Sasaki sets out to protect his teacher using her very own teachings: to strive for the impossible.

- Chapter 3. **Love is Blind (Koi wa Moumoku, 恋は盲目)**
A one-shot story about a boy that is blind to everything but love. Can he confess to his crush?

- Chapter 4. **Shikaku (シカク)**
A notorious hit-man bites off more than they can chew when their newest target turns out to be holding a supernatural secret. Bullets fly and love is in the air.

Volume 2: 22-26

- Chapter 1. **Siren Rhapsody (Ningyo Rhapsody, 人魚ラプソディ)**
In a world where sirens are common, the protagonist is a hybrid of a human father and a mermaid mother. He's always playing the piano under the sea, when a strange siren approaches him…

- Chapter 2. **"When I Woke Up I had Become a Girl" Disease (Me wo Sametara Onnanoko ni Natteita Byou, 目が覚めたら女の子になっていた病)**
A boy wakes up to discover he has become a girl! How will this affect his daily life?!

- Chapter 3. **Nayuta of the Prophecy (Yogen no Nayuta, 予言のナユタ)**
A tale about a prophecy involving a girl with horns who is said to bring destruction upon the world, and her brother.

- Chapter 4. **Little Sister's Elder Sister (Imouto no Ane, 妹の姉)**
A story about sisters aspiring to be artists.

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Standard of Reincarnation
summary:
Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.

title: I Became the Male Lead’s Adopted Daughter
summary:
"I'm going to adopt a child."

Duke Phileo Boleoti's impulsive decision shocked everyone in the mansion. Not only did he make her his daughter, but he also gave her the name of a 'beast' that only direct members of the bloodline could receive.

"Even as you breathe right now, I'm earning money."
"It's confidence, not arrogance."
"My face really does have its advantages."
The most arrogant father in the whole world, and-

"I love muscles the most. Let's get muscular."
"Show me your thigh muscles! Your butt would be even better!"
"You're nothing but a flower if you have a calm personality…" his corrupted(?) daughter. 

And… "I will give his excellency the information he wants most."

"Information I want most, you say…"

"You won’t regret it."

…A stepmother(?) with a strange secret as well.

title: Kneel, Your Grace!
summary:
Everyone dreams of knocking out their insufferable boss, but what if that boss is a war hero, a duke, and constantly breathing down your neck? For Chloe, enduring Curtis's relentless inspections was a daily struggle... Until a royal marriage decree offers her an unexpected way out.

---
Everyone has had the urge to punch their infuriating boss, but actually going through with it is hard. Especially when that boss is a war hero and a grand duke, no less. Chloe could only grit her teeth as she watched Curtis constantly conduct service inspections… but then, a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity presented itself. The king ordered Curtis to marry a noblewoman from another country, and he put forward his lieutenant, Chloe, as his lover. Now, the gun was in her hands… “First, get on your knees, Your Grace.”

title: I’m a Fake Saintess but the Gods are Obsessed
summary:
I reincarnated into the body of a fake saintess who will die when the real saintess appears five years later. If I were to gather the monthly allowance given to the saintess I can at the very least buy a building! But while I was carefully setting up a plan to run away after playing the role of the saintess... 

"Choose me, or else..." 

"I prepared a prison just for you. My goddess—" 

"..." 

The male leads reacted differently than I expected. 

[The bored divine beings have started to gain interest after watching you.] 

I, Ariel, unexpectedly gained the interest of the gods. On top of that, the final boss who is planning on destroying the world isn't killing me, but helping me...? I have no interest in gaining the interest of the gods or destroying the world! So please just let me become a landlord like I wanted—!

title: I’m Gonna Annihilate This Land
summary:
Kim Isaac, once the all-powerful Skeleton King, is now a baby in a onesie. Tricked by the gods and sealed away, he’s reincarnated into a family of saints at the heart of the Holy Empire. He can’t walk or talk, but he can plot. And with his loyal demon followers working from the shadows and a grudge deeper than the underworld itself, this baby isn’t here to be cute—he’s here for payback. The Holy Empire has no idea what's coming… and the gods are about to regret ever crossing the Skeleton King. 

---

**Original Webtoon:**     
- [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/65947762)
- [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4-%EB%82%98%EB%9D%BC%EB%A5%BC-%EC%97%86%EC%95%A8-%EC%98%88%EC%A0%95%EC%9D%B8%EB%8D%B0%EC%9A%94/4388)

**Official Translations:**    
- [English](https://tapas.io/series/holy-hellas-ultimate-end/)
- [Japanese](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/181153)

title: The S-Class Hunter Doesn’t Want to Be a Villainous Princess
summary:
S-class Hunter Kim Yiyoung can't wait to leave the novel she woke up in. She gets the chance after defeating the story's final boss, but instead of returning home, she's sent into another novel! Yiyoung becomes Lady Renee Markious, a petty villainess who's just been framed for murder. Fortunately, Yiyoung has a secret weapon nobody knows about… her skills from her past life! Can Yiyoung clear Renee's name and find her way back to her own world? Or will she be trapped in this tale for good?

---
"I'm done with romance, so send me home!"

Kim Yi-Young was just an ordinary civil service exam candidate in South Korea.
After studying for more than four and a half years, she finally passed, a truly ordinary person with nothing but reading novels here and there as a hobby.

However, on the day she went out for a celebratory meal after passing the exam, she got into a traffic accident and died, only to find herself reincarnated into the fantasy hunter novel she was reading.

To her, the "System" offered a way back home.
Determined solely to return home and cuddle her warm cat and adorable Maltese, Cerberus, she gained strength through dozens of regressions.

Signing contracts with the constellations of the original work and dying multiple times, she eventually succeeded in conquering the "Tower" of the original work and defeating the owner of the tower on the final floor.

Now, all that's left is to go home......

Or so she thought!

[Due to an error, instead of returning to the original world, we will reincarnate you into the author's new work!]

I don't need that! All I wanted was my sweet home! Is that so difficult?! I even got rid of the Tower!?

Moreover, romance fantasy?! Even in my previous life, I didn't care about romance, not one bit!
And to top it off, I didn't even reincarnate into my own body this time, but into the "villainess" of the book!

I'm not afraid of the threats in this world, but I'm worried about being forced into a romance quest.

"Can I go home...?"

title: Divorce Plan
summary:
I already possess the body of a woman who will marry the devil. In a role haunted by her husband until death.

"I will always be by your side!"

I've decided to be nice to this poor husband for a while. But before one day, when I had reached adulthood and planned to divorce. A little angel appeared in the night full of surprises. Oh, man. So I tried to run away before being discovered…

"Richard? Something's not right…"

"I have no intention of letting you run away, even if you die, you must stay in my arms. Elisha."

Trying to cry and beg with a pretty face is also not possible.

"Where are you going to take our child?"

Did he even chase after me with those cold eyes? …I guess I was wrong to run away like this. How to solve this situation?

---
After losing her parents at an early age, noble lady Elissa Lohengrin is brought into the powerful House Rubelin by the duke so that she can marry his grandson, Richard. However, having read this story in her past life, Elissa knows Richard is destined to murder her! To avoid this, Elissa makes a deal with Richard to divorce when they become adults. But as she plans for her future single life, Richard's feelings begin to grow, and a whirlwind of events begins that pulls Elissa closer to danger.

title: The Princess Of A Fallen Kingdom Kisses Him Morning And Night To Break The Curse
summary:
Cheryl, the princess of a fallen country, was cursed by Piany, the princess of the enemy country that destroyed her country, to "burn her body when exposed to sunlight," and she spent her days being tortured. However, when Liam, a handsome general, came to the castle to occupy it, Cheryl was protected. As an efficient way to break the curse, she decided to kiss Liam morning and night to inject his magical power into her...!?
This kiss was necessary to break the curse. But that was all it was supposed to be--
